1.0.name: wordpress/ep-tools-eros-pedrini-tools-atom-fix
1.0.description: This plugin fixes a validation problem related with RFC 4685 atom feed extension: some validators (e.g., w3c) don't like the thr:total extension. Therefore, this plugin fixes this problem removing the tag from the atom feed without any hack to wordpress code.
